detail_desc: Gently tailored shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a matching bow tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, chest pocket, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves, and a rounded hem. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and decorative elastic straps at the front.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Sandals in imitation leather. Ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.

Set with a top and trousers in soft jersey. Top with a hood with a wrapover front and buttons at the top, a small patch pocket on one side and double-layered front section. Trousers with an elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons and sewn-in turn ups at the hems. The cotton content of the garments is organic.

Shirt in premium cotton with a grandad collar, French front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Suede mules with a large bow at the front and braided jute trim around the soles. Satin linings and leather insoles. Small platform 3 cm.
3/4-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband and ventilating mesh sections on the legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Jacket in soft velour with a motif on the front, lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, padded top edge, a pile tongue and lacing with speed hooks. Pile linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 4 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft waffle-knit cotton blend with a zipped pocket on one sleeve.

Short sleeveless dress in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and sewn-in wrapover front. Seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt and sewn-in ties. Unlined.
Cropped top in an airy rib knit with flounced shoulder straps and a flounce at the top.
Metal rings in various designs. Four decorated with plastic and glass beads.

Mesh hi-tops with imitation leather details, a print at the back and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Three adjustable, text-printed hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and linings and chunky rubber soles.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Short shirt dress in softly draping woven fabric with a sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
V-neck blouse in a striped cotton weave with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and tie at the back. Low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats and fasteners at the cuffs.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a deep neckline at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, button placket, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with a tab and button and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif and a ribbed trim around the neckline.
3/4-length leggings in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Short dress in an airy cotton weave with a sweetheart neckline, elastic shoulder straps and pearly buttons down the front. Flounces at the top that continue over the shoulders, a smocked seam at the waist and flared skirt in a double layer at the hem. Lined.
V-neck cardigan in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short, straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with a slight sheen. Round neck with an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short butterfly sleeves that are slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Short dress in mesh with a sequin-embroidered tiered skirt. Deep V-neck with a wrapover top and concealed press-stud at the front, and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounced trim. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a concealed zip in one side. Jersey lining. The polyester content of the dress is recycled.
Vest top in organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes. Regular fit.

Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable, lace-covered shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with appliqués.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in a soft fine knit with a brushed finish and ribbed turned-up hem.

Puffer jacket in woven fabric with a shimmering metallic finish and a detachable, fleece-lined hood. Zip down the front with a round tab and a chin guard at the top, discreet pockets in the side seams and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Slip-on trainers in mesh with elastic gores in the sides. Cotton linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Top in soft, printed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. This timeless sweatshirt is made from heavy, 460 gsm cotton sweatshirt fabric for a premium handfeel. In a straight cut and oversized for a relaxed fit, it has a round, rib-trimmed neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons at the top, gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Leggings in sturdy jersey. High waist with concealed elastication and legs with sewn-in creases down the front and a concealed zip at the hems.
Short top in a soft rib knit in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Velour all-in-one pyjamas with an appliqué on the front, and press-studs down one side and one leg.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Playsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck with lacing at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a washed look, hard-worn details, a zip fly and button and tapered legs.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey.

Shirt jacket in a sturdy weave made from a wool blend with a collar, buttons down the front and large patch pockets above the hem. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with wide turn-ups at the cuffs. Decorative fringing at the cuffs and hem.

Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in soft organic slub cotton jersey with a frill trim at the top and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Buttons at the back, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (sizes 1-4Y with no press-studs), and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Tube scarf in soft double-layered jersey. Width 35 cm, circumference 30 cm.

Shirt in premium cotton with a cutaway collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Varying pattern on the inside of the cuffs and collar stand. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Low-necked vest top in soft, ribbed viscose jersey.
Lightweight boots in imitation suede with faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in a crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, concealed pockets in the side seams and straight legs.

Suit trousers in a cotton Oxford weave with an extended waistband with adjustable elastication and a concealed fastening, and zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a flap and button and legs with creases.
Small cylindrical bag in woven fabric with a zip at the top and an adjustable shoulder strap with a text print. Lined. Size 11x16.5 cm.
Long polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

Shorts in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with embroidered appliqués, an adjustable elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and frayed, raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend.
Jacket in soft, windproof functional fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Large scarf in a soft jacquard weave with short fringes along the edges.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.
Bikini briefs in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset, high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Skinny-fit trousers in superstretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a zip at the hems.

Shirt woven in a cotton blend with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a wide flounce at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long dress in a soft knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Calf-length shirt dress in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide, buttoned cuffs. Sewn-on tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Shorts in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake front pockets.
Fitted vest top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Classic V-neck jumper in fine-knit merino wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in cotton denim with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt and zip fly. Side pockets, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short dress in soft, stretch corduroy with shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back, zip at one side and a detachable belt with a plastic buckle at the waist.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and heart-shaped press-stud. Straight cut to the hem.
